experimentation. The project's history serves as a cautionary tale about the

dangers of unchecked power and the importance of protecting individual

rights and freedoms.

   • Informed Consent: The revelations surrounding MKUltra led to

    significant reforms in the way research is conducted, particularly with

    regards to informed consent and human subject protection.

   • Government Accountability: The project's history has also highlighted
